name: citizenlink
description: Citizen Complaint Management System with enhanced security

scripts.clean:gz: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function walk(d){for(const f of fs.readdirSync(d)){const p=path.join(d,f);const s=fs.statSync(p);if(s.isDirectory())walk(p);else if(p.endsWith('.gz')){try{fs.unlinkSync(p);console.log('removed',p)}catch{}}}}walk(process.cwd());"
scripts.test-performance: npm run build && npm run benchmark
